subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games (2008)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: As he prepares to defend his gold medal in the 110-meter hurdles, Liu Xiang faces the pressure of being the biggest sports star in the world’s most populous nation.
snippet: As he prepares to defend his gold medal in the 110-meter hurdles, Liu Xiang faces the pressure of being the biggest sports star in the world’s most populous nation.
